statements: SELECT * FROM anonymized_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM anonymized_data;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM anonymized_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT research_topic, address FROM anonymized_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, age FROM anonymized_data WHERE research_topic = 'Data Science' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM anonymized_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM anonymized_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, research_topic FROM anonymized_data WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue' AND age < 50;
SELECT * FROM anonymized_data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM anonymized_data WHERE age >= 25 AND research_topic LIKE 'Artificial%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
